Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can be composed of solid components for stable operation, and high power generation efficiency is obtained by using high temperature exhaust heat for fuel reforming and bottoming power generation by a gas turbine.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Recently, low-temperature SOFCs, which run in the temperature range of around 600 degrees C or above and give high power generation efficiency, have been developed.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: On the other hand, a power generation system with multi-staged fuel cells has been proposed by the United States DOE to obtain high efficiency.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: In our present study, a power generation system consisting of two-staged SOFCs with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs was investigated.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Overpotential data for the low-temperature SOFC used in this study are based on recently published data, while data for high-temperature SOFC are based on our previous study.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The numerical results show that the power generation efficiency of the two-staged SOFCs is 50.3% and the total efficiency of power generation with gas turbine is 56.1% under standard operating conditions.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: These efficiencies are a little higher than those by high-temperature SOFC only.
Titulo: Cycle analysis of planar SOFC power generation with serial connection of low and high temperature SOFCs
